synopsis: The D.S.A. take on a mission to retrieve a drug that can cure Alzheimer's disease from a man who wants to use it to take his revenge on a man who has lost his memory.
A weather girl takes in a mysterious man whom she thinks is in trouble. She loses him and asks the DSA to find the man and to also find out his true identity.
The DSA take a job for a man who wants them to deliver a briefcase but they have no idea what is inside or in store for them later.
A rich aristocrat hires the DSA to investigate his wife on suspicion that she is having an affair with him. What the DSA uncover goes much deeper than just an affair, however.
This episode is similar to the previous episode, "Shell of lies, Posi", but instead of focusing on what Harada and Kurokawa were doing, this episode focuses on what Mikura and her friend were doing.
Harada meets an old high school friend and he reminisces about a lost love from High School.
The DSA are hired to kick some thugs out of an old apartment building but rumors of a ghost inside the building lead to an even larger adventure.
Mikura tries a virtual reality system but the experience doesn't go as planned.
The DSA go on the hunt for a serial killer clown.
When the DSA are hired to transport a mummy to a museum, they attempt to avoid the mummy's curse.
The DSA need to provide a body double for a man being hunted by the killer only known as "Phantom".
The DSA now know that Kurokawa's life is in danger. They attempt to protect him and also try to figure out who is behind the hit.
An APB has been put out on the DSA. They try to survive as they are hunted by the police and Omabari's special crooked henchmen, Kose and Akudoh.
